item.description:
DESTINY FASHION SHOW & AFTER PARTY
Aboard the Luxurious SPIRIT OF BOSTON

...SATURDAY, AUGUST 14TH 2010 11:30PM - 3:30AM


Courtesy of Noir Marketing Group, Boston City Girls Has a Special VIP Package as follows:

VIP Reception

10:30PM - 11:30PM:
@ TAMO Lounge inside the Seaport Hotel

The evening begins with appetizers and champagne at TAMO Lounge inside the Seaport Hotel across from the docks. Get a chance to mingle and be acquainted with the rest of the BCG and other VIP guests

11:30PM - 1:30AM
DESTINY BOAT CRUISE

-Live Fashion Show


From the lounge, BCG along with other VIP guests will be escorted To the VIP level of the Spirit of Boston. Complementary cake will be served on this upper level that overlooks the main floor where the fashion show will be held. The show will begin between 12:30 - 1AM with clothing by designers from across the country. Don't want to sit? Feel free to move about the boat as you please.

1:00AM - 330AM
After Party & Live Photo shoot

LETS DANCE!!!!

After the show, enjoy 4 floors of music and entertainment as you sail the Boston Harbor. Dont forget to Smile!
•☼ 4 FLOORS OF ENTERTAINMENT ☼•
1ST FLOOR: International & Caribbean Mashups
2BD FLOOR: Top40 | R&B | Hip Hop
3RD FLOOR: Exclusive VIP ACCESS NOIR Lounge
4TH FLOOR: Moon Light Roof Deck (Dance Under the Stars) & Photo Shoot

In addition, P by L Photography will be hosting live photo shoots on the roof deck of the boat. (It would be nice to get a group photo of all BCG but it is not mandatory )


***BOARDING AT 11:30PM SHARP***


TICKETS:

Tickets for BCG members and guests will only be $38 !!

Tickets will be available in paper form and online!
Deadline for BCG ticket purchases will be Aug 5th. To avoid being sold out the sooner the better :-)

For tickets contact:

Buy online

Purchase tickets

http://ladiesnightout...

Or

Purchase In person

Lumyr

617.299.1332
lumyrd@gmail.com

The online link will be available soon!

Hope to see you there!!!!!!

Purchase tickets
item.how_to_find_us: I will Meet BCG members at the TAMO Lounge. I will have a sign made.
item.name: Fashion show Boat Cruise w/ Lounge mixer
